template.name: Fronius Solar
template.description: Uses Fronius API V1 to query inverter Make sure you update the following tags after linking the template FRONIUS_HOST: hostname of the inverter/datamanager DEVICE_ID: the device you want to monitor (defaults to 1 if you only have 1 inverter)

item.name: Energy Generated Day
item.description: Total energy generated on current day by all inverters on the system

item.name: Device Error Code
item.description: error code for inverter {$DEVICE_ID}

item.name: Frequency meter
item.description: Smart meter Frequency Phase Average

item.name: InverterRealtimeDataAPI
item.description: GetInverterRealtimeData API call. Use dependent items to parse this

item.name: InverterRealtimeData_3PInverterDataAPI
item.description: GetInverterRealtimeData API call. Use dependent items to parse this

item.name: InverterRealtimeData_CommonInverterDataAPI
item.description: GetInverterRealtimeData API call. Use dependent items to parse this

item.name: MeterRealtimeDataAPI
item.description: GetMeterRealtimeData API call. Use dependent items to parse this. These items only work if your system has a smart meter installed

item.name: OhmPilotRealtimeDataAPI
item.description: GetOhmPilotRealtimeData API call. Use dependent items to parse this. Assumes you only have a single OhmPilot at device 0

item.name: PowerFlowRealtimeDataAPI
item.description: GetPowerFlowRealtimeData API call. Use dependent items to parse this

item.name: DC Current
item.description: DC current for inverter {$DEVICE_ID}

item.name: Ohmpilot Error Code
item.description: Error status of OhmPilot at device 0

item.name: Ohmpilot Status Code
item.description: status code of OhmPilot at device 0

item.name: Ohmpilot Total Energy Consumption
item.description: total energy consumed by OhmPilot at device 0

item.name: Ohmpilot Power Consumption
item.description: Current power used by OhmPilot at device 0

item.name: Ohmpilot Sensor Temperature
item.description: Temperature of sensor plugged into OhmPilot at device 0

item.name: Power Generation
item.description: Total AC power being generated by all inverters on system

item.name: Power Consumption meter
item.description: Smart meter power consumption

item.name: Power Consumption Phase 1
item.description: Smart meter power consumption

item.name: Power Consumption Phase 2
item.description: Smart meter power consumption

item.name: Power Consumption Phase 3
item.description: Smart meter power consumption

item.name: Device Status Code
item.description: status code for inverter {$DEVICE_ID}

item.name: Energy Generated Total
item.description: Total energy generated on current day by all inverters on the system

item.name: DC Voltage
item.description: DC Voltage for inverter {$DEVICE_ID}

item.name: Voltage Phase 1 inverter
item.description: Voltage measured by inverter is only available when inverter is active (i.e. doesn't work at night time). Use the equivalent meter readings if you have one

item.name: Voltage Phase 2 inverter
item.description: Voltage measured by inverter is only available when inverter is active (i.e. doesn't work at night time). Use the equivalent meter readings if you have one

item.name: Voltage Phase 3 inverter
item.description: Voltage measured by inverter is only available when inverter is active (i.e. doesn't work at night time). Use the equivalent meter readings if you have one

item.name: Power Generated Phase 1 inverter
item.description: Voltage and current measurements supplied by inverter are only available when inverter is active (i.e. doesn't work at night time). Use the equivalent meter readings if you have one

item.name: Power Generated Phase 2 inverter
item.description: Voltage and current measurements supplied by inverter are only available when inverter is active (i.e. doesn't work at night time). Use the equivalent meter readings if you have one

item.name: Power Generated Phase 3 inverter
item.description: Voltage and current measurements supplied by inverter are only available when inverter is active (i.e. doesn't work at night time). Use the equivalent meter readings if you have one

item.name: Voltage Phase 1 meter
item.description: Smart meter voltage measurement

item.name: Voltage Phase 2 meter
item.description: Smart meter voltage measurement

item.name: Voltage Phase 3 meter
item.description: Smart meter voltage measurement
